Uses of Class
xxl.core.io.Block

  • Packages that use Block 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.containers.io
    Provides some containers that are able to store their blocks on disk.
    xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
    Provides a decorator container that is able to store records (of type Block ) which are of different size.
    xxl.core.collections.queues.io
    The package xxl.core.collections.queues.io provides some implementations of the queue datastructure using special containers (BlockBasedQueue), files (FileStackQueue) or streams (StreamQueue) for storing and receiving the data.
    xxl.core.io
    Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system.

    • Uses of Block in xxl.core.collections.containers.io

      Methods in xxl.core.collections.containers.io that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Block MultiBlockContainer.getLogicalBlock(List blockList, int size)
      Returns the logical block that is given by the specified list of physical blocks.
      Methods in xxl.core.collections.containers.io with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Long MultiBlockContainer.getId(Block block)
      Returns the id of the next block in the linked list of physical block that is stored in the specified block.
      protected List MultiBlockContainer.getPhysicalBlocks(Block logicalBlock)
      Returns a list of physical blocks that represent the specified logical block.
      protected int MultiBlockContainer.setId(Block block, Object id)
      Sets the id stored in the specified block to the specified object and returns the number of bytes that are taken by the converted id.

    • Uses of Block in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

      Methods in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block Page.getRecord(short recordNr, boolean[] isLinkRecord)
      Returns the Record with the given recordNr.
      Methods in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      short RecordManager.PageInformation.getNewReservedRecordNr(Block record)
      Tries to get a new recordNr without reading the page.
      void Page.insertRecord(Block record, short newRecordNr, boolean isLinkRecord)
      Inserts a Record into this Page.
      void Page.update(Block record, short recordNr, boolean isLinkRecord)
      Overwrites the Record with id recordNr with the given record.

    • Uses of Block in xxl.core.collections.queues.io

      Fields in xxl.core.collections.queues.io declared as Block 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Block BlockBasedQueue.dummyBlock
      A dummy block that is used for getting a new id when a new write block is created.
      protected Block BlockBasedQueue.readBlock
      The block the queue currently reads from.
      protected Block BlockBasedQueue.writeBlock
      The block the queue currently writes to.

    • Uses of Block in xxl.core.io

      Fields in xxl.core.io declared as Block 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Block BufferedOutputStream.block
      The block that is actually used for storing the bytes that are written to the output stream.
      Methods in xxl.core.io that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block BlockFactory.allocate()
      Allocates and returns a new block on the underlying array.
      Block Block.compress()
      Compresses (zips) the current Block and returns the compressed Block.
      Block Block.decompress()
      Uncompresses (unzips) the current Block and returns the original Block.
